title: Bloomberg Markets: Senator Flake Announces Retirement
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Senator Flake Announces Retirement
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alex Wayne\u0010White House Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Senator Jeff Flake announcing he will not seek re-election next year and criticizing President Trump’s governing style and rhetoric.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
